traits.desc:
Executioners gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage. Their Ability can critically strike.

(@MinUnits@) @CritChanceAmpPercent@% %i:scaleCrit%; @CritAmpPercent@% %i:scaleCritMult%

(@MinUnits@) Gain @BaseHealth@ Health and +@PctAdditionalPotential@% Potential %i:set14AmpIcon%
(@MinUnits@) Gain @BaseXP@ XP per round, and another @XPPerSurvival@ for each surviving Star Student.

Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_InfernalSpeed.1:BaseAS@% Attack Speed. On takedown, generate a Cinder. Grant your team @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_InfernalSpeed.1:CinderAS@% bonus %i:scaleAS% for every @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_InfernalSpeed.1:NumCinders@ Cinders. (Cinders: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_InfernalSpeed_CindersCollected@; Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_InfernalSpeed_PermanentAS@%)
Gain @Health@ Health and immunity to crowd control. Charge to new targets, <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> enemies passed through for @StunDuration@ seconds.
When you field Lee Sin, choose between Duelist Stance, Executioner Stance, and Juggernaut Stance! Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin the associated trait.
Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_MagicExpert.1:BaseAP@% Ability Power. All other sources of Ability Power give @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_MagicExpert.1:PctBonusAP@% more.
At combat start, gain @SelfishMana@ Mana and give @AllyMana@ Mana to all allies in a line in front of this champion.

Edgelords gain Omnivamp and Attack Damage. While attacking enemies under @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% %i:scaleSV%, @AD*100@% %i:scaleAD%

Kills and losses during player combats earn Gem Power. Every @NumCombats@ player combats choose to convert Gem Power into rewards or Double Down.

While Double Down is active losses grant @PercentIncreasedGP*100@% more Gem Power, but wins lose @PercentLost*100@% Gem Power and cash out immediately.

Gem Power gains increase at stages 3 and 4.

(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_GemPowerPerKill@ per kill; @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_GemPowerPerLoss@ per loss
(@MinUnits@) AND every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_KillRequirement@ kills, gain bonus loot and reroll a new kill number. (Kills: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_GemForce_TotalKills@)
(@MinUnits@) @7PeiceMult*100@% rewards. Crystal Gambit units gain @7PieceHealth@ %i:scaleHealth% and @7PieceAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%.
When granting or receiving shields, add @PercentDamage*100@% of the shield's value as bonus physical damage on the next attack.

At combat start gain @PerCombatAmount@ permanent Health. Every @Interval@ seconds this champion survives, gain @Amount@ additional permanent Health.

(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SetMechanic_PlusPlus_Property@ %i:scaleHealth%)

If this champion has no active traits, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BuiltDifferent.1:HP1@-@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BuiltDifferent.1:HP4@ Health and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BuiltDifferent.1:AS1@-@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BuiltDifferent.1:AS4@% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

Take up two unit slots. Gain Health, Durability, and Damage Amp.
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%; @BonusDR*100@% %i:scaleDR%; @BonusDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%.
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%; @BonusDR*100@% %i:scaleDR%; @BonusDA*100@% %i:scaleDA%.
Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_RobustRanger.1:StatsPct@% of The Mighty Mech's Attack Damage and Ability Power, and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_RobustRanger.1:HealthPct@% of its Health.
Gain @Base*100@% Attack Damage, and permanently gain @Amount*100@% every 2 takedowns. (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SetMechanic_PlusPlus_Property*100@% %i:scaleAD%)
At combat start go ALL OUT, gaining @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction and @AD*100@% Attack Damage. Health no longer decays while ALL OUT.

Attacking @NumAttacksPerProc@ times grants @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_GoldenEdge_Gold@ gold. This gold value increases by 1 each time it activates. (Attacks: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_GoldenEdge_NumAttacks@ / @NumAttacksPerProc@)

Heal @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_MetabolicExplosion.1:PctRegen@% max Health every @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_MetabolicExplosion.1:Interval@ seconds. Gain @IncreasedHealing@% increased healing from all sources.
Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Unflinching.1:OmnivampPct@% Omnivamp. For the first @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Unflinching.1:Duration@ seconds of combat, gain immunity to crowd control.
Gain @BaseAS*100@% Attack Speed. On takedown, gain +1 Attack Range.
Damage dealt by Yone and Yasuo bleeds enemies for @BleedPct@% of damage dealt over @BleedDuration@ seconds.
Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_HerosArc.1:DA*100@% Damage Amp per player level. At level 10 gain an additional @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_HerosArc.1:DamageIncrease*100@% Damage Amp.

Gain @NumPackmates@ packmates that deal <physicalDamage>@DamagePercent*100@% (%i:TFTBaseAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. When Naafiri uses her Ability, packmates dash to the lowest Health enemy within @NumHexes@ hexes.
On cast, fire an additional orb that deals @PercentDamage*100@% damage to a random enemy. Subsequent casts add an additional orb.

Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below @PercentHealthThreshold@% Health. Kills have a @PercentChanceGold@% chance to drop a gold. (Gold: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_MidasTouch_GoldEarned@)

Snipers gain Damage Amp, increased against targets farther away.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% %i:scaleDA%; +@PerHexIncrease@% %i:scaleDA% per hex
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% %i:scaleDA%; +@PerHexIncrease@% %i:scaleDA% per hex
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% %i:scaleDA%; +@PerHexIncrease@% %i:scaleDA% per hex
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% %i:scaleDA%; +@PerHexIncrease@% %i:scaleDA% per hex

Star Guardians have a unique Teamwork bonus that is granted to all Star Guardians. Every Star Guardian fielded increases the bonus!

Prismatic: Field 8, then spend @ManaToPrismatic@ mana.

Prismatic: Spend @ManaToPrismatic@ mana (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_ManaSpent@)

THE STARS AWAKEN.

Rell: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_RellValue@ shieldRell: Gain shields
Syndra: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_SyndraValue@ Ability Power every @SyndraTimer@ secondsSyndra: Gain Ability Power
Xayah: Every 3rd attack deals @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_XayahValue@ (increases per stage) magic damageXayah: Magic damage on attack
Ahri: After casting, gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_AhriValue@ Mana over @AhriDuration@ secondsAhri: On cast, gain Mana
Neeko: +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_NeekoValue@% healing and shieldingNeeko: Increase heals & shields
Poppy: At 40% Health, heal @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_PoppyValue@% %i:scaleHealth%Poppy: Heal at low Health
Jinx: +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_JinxValue@% Attack Speed. +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_JinxBonusASValue@% %i:scaleAS% after takedowns, decaying over 3sJinx: Gain Attack Speed
Seraphine: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_SeraphineValue@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%%i:scaleHealth% and @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_StarGuardian_SeraphineValue@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAS%%i:scaleCrit%%i:scaleCritMult%Seraphine: Gain every stat
Emblem: Increase bonuses by @EmblemBonus*100@%!Emblem: Increase other bonuses
Cast Abilities twice, but deal @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Mage.1:DAMultiplier*100@% less total damage.
Every other cast, Lux's spell explodes in a 2-hex radius, and deals @Percent*100@% more damage.
Every @ICD@ seconds, Burn and Wound the closest non-Burning enemy for @Duration@ seconds. Deal @DamageAmp*100@% more damage to Burning enemies.

Set Attack Speed to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Precision.1:ForcedAttackSpeed@. Convert @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Precision.1:ASScale*100@% Attack Speed to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Precision.1:ADScale*100@% Attack Damage. Attacks deal @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Precision.1:AttackAmount*100@% more damage and grant @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Precision.1:Mana@ more Mana.

Combat Start: Ryze is frozen for the first @Duration@ seconds of combat. His Ability @Chill@% Chills enemies for @ChillDuration@ seconds, and deals @PctSpellDamage*100@% bonus damage to enemies adjacent to the target.

Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_100PushUps.1:DR*100@% Damage Reduction. For every @NumRerolls@ rerolls you spend gold on, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_100PushUps.1:DAPerReroll*100@% permanent Damage Amp. (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_100PushUps_TotalPercentDA@% %i:scaleDA%)
If this champion survives a player combat, gain @NumGold@ gold.
This unit is a Mentor. They grant @Amp*100@% Damage Amp, and at Mentor 4 they gain @Stats*100@% Attack Damage and Ability Power instead of upgrading their spell.

Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_KaijuSize.1:HealthRatio*100@% max Health and grow larger. After @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_KaijuSize.1:Countdown@ seconds, <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> all enemies for 1.5 seconds.

(@MinUnits@) Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:Health@ Health, @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% Attack Damage, and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% Ability Power for each Fighter or Assassin fielded.
(@MinUnits@) Increased to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:Health@ %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%, and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% %i:scaleAP%.
Damage this champion deals contributes @Percent*100@% more towards launching rockets from The Crew's ship.

Gain @NumWeights@ Weights. At 1+, move and attack @PercentReduction*100@% slower. Player victories drop @WeightPerCombat@ Weights, 2 on a loss. At 0, move faster and gain @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction. (Weights Left: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_Weights_NumWeights@)

Your team gains @TeamBonusHealth@ Health.

Heavyweights gain additional bonus Health, and Attack Damage equal to a percentage of their Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth% | @HealthPercentToAD@% %i:scaleHealth% to %i:scaleAD%
Gain @Armor@ Armor. Enemies attacking this champion take @Damage@ + @DamagePerStage@ per stage physical damage. (@ICD@ second cooldown per attacker)
Takedowns grant @AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed that rapidly decays over @DecayDuration@ seconds.

Crew champions gain @StatBonus*100@% Health and Attack Speed for each Crew member fielded.

Every 3-star Crew champion grants an additional bonus.

(1x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): +@XPPerReroll@ XP per paid reroll, and Crew unit odds never drop with player level.
(2x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): +1 free reroll / round.
(3x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Deal @BaseDamageThreshold@ damage to fire a rocket dealing @BaseRocketDamage@.
(4x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Fire rockets @RocketRatePerLevel*100@% more often per player level.
(5x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Fire the Planet Cracker.

(@MinUnits@) Pilot the Mech, granting it your stats: @HealthShare*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @OtherStatShare*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAS%. Eject when at @MechHealth*100@%.
(@MinUnits@) The Mech benefits from the pilots' traits.

Gain Attack Speed. At combat start, disable the opposite enemy for @Duration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) @ASBoost*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@MinUnits@) @ASBoost*100@% %i:scaleAS%. Disable two enemies.
Damage 30% Shreds and Sunders enemies for @Duration@ seconds. Deal @DamageAmp*100@% increased damage against Shredded and Sundered enemies.
On cast, gain stacking Attack Damage equal to @ADPctFromMana@% of Mana spent.
Abilities target the lowest Health enemy in range instead. Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_KillerInstinct.1:ManaRegen@ Mana Regen.
Store @PercentMaxHealthInitial@% max Health at combat start and @PercentMaxHealthPerSecond@% more every second. On death, deal the stored Health as magic damage in a large radius.
Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Selfish.1:DR@% Durability. Heal for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Selfish.1:HealPct@% of damage dealt by all other allies.
If this champion is the only Soul Fighter fielded, it gains the benefits of Soul Fighter (4).
If this champion starts combat alone in its row, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_StandStrong.1:HealthRatio*100@% Health.

The Cell who dealt the most damage last combat is Supreme. When the Supreme Cell dies, the Cell with the highest current damage becomes Supreme.

Cells gain Damage Amp. The Supreme Cell gains more and executes enemies under @OverlordExecute*100@% Health.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% | @OverlordDamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% | @OverlordDamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% | @OverlordDamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%. Gain a second Supreme
On death, summon a Training Dummy equipped with the same items. It has @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_RoundTwo.1:PercentHealth@% of this unit's health.

At the start of each round, gain a random permanent stat bonus.

Current: +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_AD*100@ %i:scaleAD%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_AP@ %i:scaleAP%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_AS*100@% %i:scaleAS%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_Armor@ %i:scaleArmor%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_MR@ %i:scaleMR%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_Health@ %i:scaleHealth%, +@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Over9000_Mana@ %i:TFTManaRegen%
Gain @Base*100@% Attack Speed, and permanently gain @Amount*100@% every 3 takedowns. (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SetMechanic_PlusPlus_Property*100@% %i:scaleAS%)
Attacks and Abilities ignore @PercentIgnore@% of enemy's Magic Resistance.
Senna and Lucian both gain @ManaRegen@ mana regen. If both are 3-star, gain +1 Mighty Mech.

Soul Fighters gain bonus Health, and gain Attack Damage and Ability Power every second up to @MaxStacks@ stacks. At max stacks deal bonus true damage.

Prismatic: Field 8, then win @PlayerDamageToPrismatic@ combats.

Prismatic: Defeat @PlayerDamageToPrismatic@ players in combat. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SoulFighter_PlayerDamageDealt@)

MAXIMUM SOUL POWER.

(@MinUnits@) @FlatHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @StatsPerSecond*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, +@BonusTrueDamage*100@% damage
(@MinUnits@) @FlatHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @StatsPerSecond*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, +@BonusTrueDamage*100@% damage
(@MinUnits@) @FlatHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @StatsPerSecond*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, +@BonusTrueDamage*100@% damage
(@MinUnits@) @FlatHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @StatsPerSecond*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, +@BonusTrueDamage*100@% damage
Attacks deal @PercentDamage*100@% of Basic Attack Damage as physical damage to enemies within attack range of the target.

(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WonderTwins.1:MinUnits@) When fielding 2+ copies of this unit, grant both @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WonderTwins.2:Stats@% of a stat based on Role. At 3-Star, gain a 2-Star copy.
(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WonderTwins.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WonderTwins.2:Stats@% bonus stats.

Gain @BaseADAP@% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each takedown, don a hat that grants @ADAPPerHat@% of each. On death, lose @PercentHatLoss*100@% of your hats. (Current Hats: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SetMechanic_MaxCap_Hats@)
Your team gains @DABase@% Damage Amp, increased by @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Superstar.1:DAPer3Star@% for each 3-Star on your team. This champion gains @Multiplier*100@% of the bonus.
Gain @Base@% Ability Power, and permanently gain @Amount@% every 2 takedowns. (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_SetMechanic_PlusPlus_Property@% %i:scaleAP%)

Ascend an additional time at levels @Level1@ and @Level2@.

Level @Level1@: Gain @APPerAttack@% Ability Power every @NumAttacks@ attacks.
Level @Level2@: Launch 2 additional waves that deal @ReducedWaveDamage*100@% damage.
Gain @Resists@ Armor and Magic Resistance. At combat start allies in the back row gain @AS@% Attack Speed for every @PerXResists@ combined %i:scaleArmor% and %i:scaleMR% this champion has.
When switching targets, blink to the next target. The next attack deals <magicDamage>@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_TimeSkip.1:PctAdditionalDamage@%</magicDamage> more as magic damage.
Start combat with full Mana.

The Champ's victories against players grant Poro-fans equal to his star level. On loss, Poro-fans prevent @PlayerDamagePrevented@ Tactician damage each, then lose all of your Poro-fans.

Poro Fanbase: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Trait_ElTigre_NumPoros@
Your Monster has +@Levels@ Monster Trainer levels.
Gain @AS@% Attack Speed and @AP@% Ability Power. After @FirstThreshold@ and @SecondThreshold@ attacks, this amount doubles. (Attacks: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_Surge66_NumAttacks@)
After round @AppropriateStage@-@AppropriateRound@ if this champion is 3-star, become 4-star at combat start.
This champion's last-listed trait is @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Classy.1:IncreasedEffectiveness@% more effective on them.
Gain an additional plant. Plants deal @PctOfDamage*100@% less damage and have @PctOfHealth*100@% less Health.

The first attack on each enemy deals <physicalDamage>@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_SeriousSlam.1:AttackScale*100@% (%i:TFTBaseAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_SeriousSlam.1:KnockupDuration@ seconds.

Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

(@MinUnits@) @AbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @AbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @AbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPct*100@% max %i:scaleHealth% to @TargetNum@ enemies
Fire @BonusNeedles@ bonus needles with every 1st and 2nd cast that deal @ReducedDamage*100@% damage.

Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury.1:BaseHealth@ Health and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury.1:BaseAD*100@% Attack Damage. Each round, you may pay @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury.1:PlayerHealthPerSacrifice@ player health for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury.1:HealthPerSacrifice@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury.1:ADPerSacrifice*100@ %i:scaleAD%.

(Total: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury_Health@ %i:scaleHealth% @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_MechanicTrait_BloodFury_AD*100@ %i:scaleAD%)
Fire @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_BulletHell.1:IncreasedProjectiles@% more projectiles with abilities.

Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Finalist.1:InitialDA*100@% Damage Amp and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Finalist.1:InitialDR*100@% Damage Reduction, increased by @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Finalist.1:IncreasedDA*100@% %i:scaleDA% and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Finalist.1:IncreasedDR*100@% %i:scaleDR% for each eliminated player.

When taking damage, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_AdaptiveSkin.1:ResistsPerDamageInstancePhysical@ Armor or @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_AdaptiveSkin.1:ResistsPerDamageInstanceMagic@ Magic Resistance based on the damage type, up to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_AdaptiveSkin.1:TotalResists@ total resists.
Abilities deal @PercentBleed@% bonus damage as true damage over @BleedDuration@ seconds.

On cast spawn 2 fairies that each deal <magicDamage>@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FairyTail.1:APDamage1@-@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FairyTail.1:APDamage4@</magicDamage> (based on Stage) magic damage to the target over the next @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FairyTail.1:Duration@ seconds.

Choose which monster Lulu summons to replace her in combat! It earns XP after each combat and bonus XP for each takedown it participates in.

Each unique monster tracks XP seperately; field Lulu again to reselect her monster.

Your strongest active monster gains @HealthGainPerLevel*100@% Health per level. At level @FirstEvolveLevel@ and @SecondEvolveLevel@ its spell evolves!

Monster: Level @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_MonsterLevel@ @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_SelectionName@

XP To Next Level: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_MonsterCurrentXP@/@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_MonsterXPToLevel@

Juggernauts gain Durability, increased above @HealthBreakpoint*100@% health. When a Juggernaut dies, other Juggernauts heal for @HealRatio*100@% of their max Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BaseDR*100@% or @IncreasedDR*100@% %i:scaleDR%

Gain @1Star@/@2Star@/@3Star@ placeable plants, based on Zyra's star level. Plants in the front two rows grow into durable Grasping Roots, while plants in the back two rows grow into Deadly Spines.

Rosemother plants benefit from Zyra's Ability Power and Attack Speed.

When Zyra casts, her plant restores @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Health and gains @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat. If the plant is dead, she revives it instead.

Abilities can Critically Strike. Every @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_CriticalThreat.1:Interval@ seconds, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_CriticalThreat.1:CriticalStrikeChance@% Critical Strike Chance.
Ability damage <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Demolitionist.1:StunDuration@ second.

(@MinUnits@) Summon a storm that echoes @PercentDamageEcho*100@% of damage dealt as magic damage.
(@MinUnits@) Both champions contribute damage. The storm is bigger.
Gain Attack Speed equal to @PercentHealthAsAS*100@% maximum Health. Attacks grant @BonusMana@ bonus Mana.

After @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Doomsayer.1:Countdown@ seconds, if still alive, deal <magicDamage>@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Doomsayer.1:PercentOfDamageTaken*100@%</magicDamage> of damage taken this combat as magic damage to all enemies.

Create a perfect copy of this champion with the same items equipped that deals @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_ShadowJutsu.1:DamagePercent*100@% damage and has @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_ShadowJutsu.1:HealthMod*100@% health.

(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:MinUnits@) If alive at @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:FirstDeath@ and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:SecondDeath@ seconds, kill the enemy with the most Health
(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:MinUnits@) At @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:FirstDeath@ and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:SecondDeath@ seconds instead.
